text:
.2.
Hotel reservations are being made by Headquarters. To
assist the staff in making plans, would you please indicate if
you will need a room on Thursday evening, December 5* Unless
we hear from you to that effect, reservations will be made for
the evenings of December 6 and 7 only. Instructions In regard
to hotel reservations should be addressed to Harry Skornia at
Headquarters. Headquarters will send you the usual tax-exempt
blanks and expense account information.
Some of you already have sent me suggestions as to the
agenda for the meeting. I hope the rest will too.
BPxds
